text: Barbara Blair was an American film actress. She played leading and supporting roles in several British films including The Outsider (1939).Goble p.53 ==Selected filmography== * Star of the Circus (1938) * The Outsider (1939) * Lucky to Me (1939) * Bedelia (1946) * Tall Headlines (1952) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1911 births Category:1976 deaths Category:American film actresses Category:American emigrants to the United Kingdom Category:20th-century American actresses
title: Barbara Blair
